alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wayne County through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grosse Pointe, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wayne County, including the following locations... Northeast Detroit, Harper Woods, Grosse Pointe Shores, Hamtramck, Grosse Pointe Woods, Grosse Pointe Park, Grosse Pointe Farms and Highland Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
